post.body: Btw, I hope you have a nice day at work.
Oh sorry, Hope you have a good day at work.
Really? A boomer at the bottom of your stairs? @mrashwilliams Why did you go back to wow?
Sounds badass, since it's a George Foreman Grill. I'm slightly upset since Azra needs to sleep and I only talked with her for 5 min
It may be a little late but good luck! Enjoying my christmas by listening to Paint it Black and eating a treat from my stocking.
Hey man, it's great to hear that your stepdad will be out of the hospital soon, so you can spend time with him on Christmas ^.^.
..Why am I not asleep? Going to sleep now. G'night.
Ehh, Feel like my life is slowly getting boring and having somewhat of an existential crisis. Wondering why we are on the earth just to die.
/sigh. So bored, wish I had something to do. I can't go to sleep.
Merry Christmas!
So bored.. if Callan or Ash reads this, we should start up a holiday L4D game.
Going to try to take a nap.. so tired
So tired. Last day of school before winter break. It's a half day and we go bowling during 3rd+4th block. 1st block is just bagels and soda.
Listening to the Cowboy Bebop Opening, going to write a "Refrain" poem on the human mind. Planning on watching cowboy bebop/Trigun eng dub.
I KNOW MAELSTROM'S REAL NAME!!! LAWLALWLAWLALWLALWLALWALWLAWLWALALWL
Finished reading the latest "Bakuman". It's a weird manga about two guys trying to be the top manga writers. It's really funny.
SAD FACE TO AZRA!
Going to sleep. Recently listened to Bob Seger's "Old Time Rock and Roll."
Going to school. Azra doesn't love me since she lynched me -sadface-. Bai!
Now I'm reviewing math before sleeping at 1:00 AM.
